# Docker

  • Docker commands
docker run <image>
docker start <image|id>
docker stop <image|id>
docker ps [-a]
docker rm <name|id>
  • examples
docker run -it ubuntu bash
docker run -d -p 80:80 --name webserver nginx
  • Create Image
docker build -t user/img-name .
